9 #include <cmath>
10 #include "calculator/losses/WallLosses.h"
11 
12 double WallLosses::getHeatLoss() {
13  const double boltzman = 0.1713 * std::pow(10, -8);
14  const double sqrt_wv = 1 + (1.277 * windVelocity);
15  const double hl_conv1 = conditionFactor * std::pow((1 / 24.0), 0.2);
16  const double hl_conv2 = std::pow((1.0 / ((ambientTemperature + surfaceTemperature) / 2.0)), 0.181);
17  const double hl_conv3 = std::pow((surfaceTemperature - ambientTemperature), 0.266);
18  const double hl_conv4 = std::sqrt(sqrt_wv);
19  const double hl_conv = (hl_conv1 * hl_conv2 * hl_conv3 * hl_conv4) * surfaceArea * (surfaceTemperature - ambientTemperature);
20  const double hl_rad1 = std::pow((surfaceTemperature + RAD_CONSTANT), 4.0);
21  const double hl_rad2 = std::pow((ambientTemperature + RAD_CONSTANT), 4.0);
22  const double hl_rad3 = hl_rad1 - hl_rad2;
23  const double hl_rad = surfaceEmissivity * boltzman * hl_rad3 * surfaceArea;
24  heatLoss = (hl_conv + hl_rad) * correctionFactor;
25  return heatLoss;
26 }
RAD_CONSTANT
#define RAD_CONSTANT
